sections.paragraph: + Father of Zuriel, chief of the Levitical father of Merari, a contemporary of Moses. (Numbers 3:35) (B.C. 1490.) + Wife of Abishur. (1 Chronicles 2:29) + Son of Huri, of the tribe of Gad. (1 Chronicles 5:14) + Wife of Rehoboam. She is called the daughter, i.e. descendant, of Eliab, the elder brother of David. (2 Chronicles 11:18) (B.C. 972.) + Father of Esther and uncle of Mordecai. (Esther 2:15; 9:29)
